metadata.title: A Tempo-geographic Analysis of Global COVID-19 Epidemic Outside of China

abstract.original_text: Understanding the global epidemic trends, geographic distribution, and transmission patterns of COVID-19 contribute to providing timely information for the global response of the epidemic. This study aims to understand the global pandemic geo-spatial patterns and trends and identify new epicenters requiring urgent attention.
